page.title: 07CRAMOND :Weekend Life
page.content: A day in the life of an 11 year-old boy: Saturday is a busy day for me. At 0800 I have breakfast and sometimes go to play in the school football team.I go to my guitar lesson at 1215 and have ti get my music ready and check my guitar.I take the bus part of the way.After the lesson I walk to the bus-stop and take the bus home. Often my friends are on the bus. After something to eat I like to go golfing at Silverknowes. In the evening I usually watch a film with my dad. I enjoy choosing a video with him. I have a couple of biscuits before saying goodnight. In bed I listen to Ultravox which is pop music at its best. I have just got a new Walkman personal stereo. I haven't used it outside yet. I go to sleep about 2300 knowing I need not get up early in the morning.
